category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 25 (Method of Appointing Committee Members, etc.)
contents: Article 25 (Method of Appointing Committee Members, etc.) ① The chairman of the organizing committee shall be the head of the metropolitan government of the host city or province, and the chairman shall appoint vice-chairmen and committee members, including one chairman of the member city/provincial sports association of the host city/province. Revised on July 29, 2020, January 24, 2022. ② The organizing committee may appoint advisors to seek advice on competition operation, etc.
